page.title: 13RECREATION COUNTRY PARK
page.content: ACCESS TO MOEL FAMAU PARK. This is reached by road, south of the village of Llangynhafal, it is clearly sign posted, but there is no access for cars beyond the church. ECOLOGY. The ground rises steeply on either side of the path which is densly covered with bracken, substantial areas of ground being cleared (cut back by hand) to provide grazing for the sheep. DERELICT LAND. On the slope to the left of the path are the remains of a former stone quarry, long disused, now over grown and providing good shelter for the sheep.
